channel.title: Covid19 on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Covid19 on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD

item.title: COVID-19 Germany local incidence and ICU occupancy (in German)
item.description: Some time ago at the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic, I decided to create a Twitter bot to automatically gather the latest data in Germany and share it to the Twittersphere. I also created and deployed a dashboard heroku app.
